title: Pulisic's Playing Time Conundrum
description:
The FC crew react to the news that Christian Pulisic is linked with a move to Manchester United on a loan and debate whether the deal would be a positive shift for the young American ahead of this year's World Cup. Plus, Cristiano Ronaldo hints at spilling behind-the-scenes information on Man United in a future tell-all interview and more leaks continue to drip out of the Man United locker room.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: Christian Pulisic linked with loan move to Man United; Ronaldo and the dressing room leaks at Man United; Do Chelsea need a No. 9 to finish top 4?
